Name: Pineapple Mojito
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Lightly MUDDLE mint (just to bruise) in glass.
Two-thirds fill glass with crushed ice and CHURN with barspoon.
Fill glass with more crushed ice and briefly CHURN.
Review: A fruity, vanilla-ed twist on the classic Mojito .
History: Discovered in 2003 at Apartment 195, London, England. Mojito Cocktail hostory .
